author: Vexed (Vexed#9000)
description: Use Wake on LAN from Discord! This cog sends magic packets on the local network. You'll need to have set up teh computer beforehand to listen to these - just search how to set it up for your operating system.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing! Once you've loaded the cog, get started by adding the computer you want to wake's MAC address with `wolset add <friendly_name> <mac>` then you can wake it with just `wol <friendly_name>`. `<friendly_name>` can be whatever you want.

This cog has docs! Check them out at <https://go.vexcodes.com/c/wol>
name: WOL
short: Use Wake on LAN from Discord! This cog sends magic packets on the local network.
